item.name: Unkempt Harold
item.source: Savage Lee and Torgue Vending Machines
item.text: Did I fire six shots, or only five? Three? Seven. Whatever.

item.name: Nukem
item.source: The Black Queen and Torgue Vending Machines

item.name: Rapier
item.source: Mission: Message in a Bottle (Hayter's Folly)
item.text: As I end the refrain, thrust home.
